Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.

Label: Parameter Category 1
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: For PARAMCD ending in sufix "IVR" or "IVR' followed by a numeric, set to "RECIST 1.1".

Label: Parameter Category 2
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: For PARAMCD ending in sufix "IVR" or "IVR' followed by a numeric, set to "INVESTIGATOR".

Label: Parameter (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned based on PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned as the decoded version of PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Analysis Visit (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to VISITNUM from the record used to populate AVAL, select AVISIT.

Label: Analysis Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Where ADSL.STAGE=EXPANSION:
If ADT < ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as (ADT - RANDDT). 
If ADT >= ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as (ADT - RANDDT + 1).
Null if ADSL.RANDDT is null.

Where ADSL.STAGE=ESCALATION:
If ADT < ADSL.TRTSDT then calculated as (ADT - TRTSDT). 
If ADT >= ADSL.TRTSDT then calculated as (ADT - TRTSDT + 1).
Null if ADSL.TRTSDT is null.
XL Comments: ML 12/12/24: For Escalation subjects use TRTSDT and for Expansion subjects which are randomized use RANDDT. This update should be made across all efficacy ADaMs.

Label: Criterion 1 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to 'Y' if the record indicates an objective response.
Set to 'Y' if PARAMCD = 'CBORIVR' and AVALC in ('Confirmed CR', 'Confirmed PR')

Label: Criterion 2 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to 'Y' if the record indicates a BOR that is considered "Disease Control".
Set to 'Y' if PARAMCD = 'CBORIVR' and AVALC in ('Confirmed CR', 'Confirmed PR', 'SD', "NON-CR/NON-PD")

Label: Unconfirmed CR Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Populated where PARAMCD = 'CBORIVR'. Set to ADRS.UCRFL from the record selected as the Best Overall Response record.

Label: Unconfirmed PR Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Populated where PARAMCD = 'CBORIVR'. Set to ADRS.UPRFL from the record selected as the Best Overall Response record.
